comments:
Description:
DataException when extract data from nestquery using setInstanceID

Steps to reproduce:
1. Use DataExtractionTask to export data from a report, the report contains a nest query structure, set instanceid to export data from list and table.

Expected result:
Data is extracted out correctly.

Actual result:
2006-8-29 17:25:31 org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.DataEngineImpl shutdown
信息: Data engine shuts down
org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.core.DataException: A report document error occurred when loading: Subquery
A report document error occurred when getting the load stream.
	at org.eclipse.birt.data.engine.impl.document.ResultIterator.getSecondaryIterator(ResultIterator.java:307)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.DataExtractionTask.getResultSetIterator(DataExtractionTask.java:711)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.DataExtractionTask.extractByInstanceID(DataExtractionTask.java:598)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.engine.api.impl.DataExtractionTask.extract(DataExtractionTask.java:512)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.tests.engine.api.DataExtractionTaskTest.testDataExtractionFromIID_nestquery(DataExtractionTaskTest.java:258)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:39)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:25)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:324)
	at junit.framework.TestCase.runTest(TestCase.java:154)

This is not a BIRT's bug.

The Unit test case , which Liwen Chen has used to test the nestquery, has a bug. Fixed the Unit test case, then the nestquery is ok when exporting data with the instance ID.

traces.message: A report document error occurred when loading: Subquery A report document error occurred when getting the load stream.
